definition: to show forth/to appear as a vivid image/to stand out markedly
to jump/to leap
correct/right/so/thus/like this/-ly
to appear vividly on paper (idiom); to show forth vividly (in writing, painting etc)/to stand out markedly

sentences.english: It is evident in the people and the culture.
sentences.chinese: 它还跃然于民众和文化之间。

sentences.english: Though it is shorter than I hope, the love to our Motherland is vividly displayed on the paper.
sentences.chinese: 尽管短了一些，但是其中对祖国热爱之情跃然纸上。

sentences.english: Click the Red, a stream of bleak vividly ink heart.
sentences.chinese: 轻点红尘，一溪墨色的凄凉跃然心间。

sentences.english: As they watch the ladies, they scribble on paper.
sentences.chinese: 在看客的观赏间，美丽的女士跃然纸上。

sentences.english: In the temples of India and Japan, the tales of Asia came to life.
sentences.chinese: 而在印度及日本的寺庙里，亚洲的童话故事跃然眼前。

sentences.english: When it's scanned, numbers and letters pop up on the scanner.
sentences.chinese: 当对它进行扫描时，数字和字母跃然于屏幕上。

sentences.english: His personality comes through with in his writing.
sentences.chinese: 他的性格跃然显现于他年写的文章中。

sentences.english: The banner headline leaped out at me from the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 报纸上的通栏标题跃然映入我的眼帘。

sentences.english: The answer presented itself when I looked at the problem again.
sentences.chinese: 那问题我又看了一遍，答案便跃然眼前。

definition: to appear vividly on paper (idiom); to show forth vividly (in writing, painting etc)/to stand out markedly
vivid and lifelike (idiom); true to life/realistic
living spirit, living image (idiom); true to life/vivid and realistic
to spread out
to set each other off nicely
as if/just like
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
to come to prominence/to appear clearly/to stick out
faintly discernible (idiom)
to draw the outline of/to outline/to sketch/to delineate contours of/to give a brief account of
to be quick-witted
vivid/lively
to appear before (one's eyes)/to come to (one's mind)
completely/fully/without omission
to trace over/to take a copy (of a calligraphy, a painting etc)/(fig.) to describe/to portray
to sketch out/to delineate
